hero.title:
I will craft
your website
hero.subtitle: A Portfolio by Gabriel Carreño
hero.description: I build high-performance, scalable, and user-friendly web and mobile applications that solve real-world problems and delight users.

services.title: With a wide selection of materials. . .
services.subtitle: I provide development from concept to deployment, with a wide range of varied technologies like so:

list.title: Custom Frontend Development
list.description: I specialize in building dynamic, responsive, and scalable web applications using modern frameworks like Angular and React. I transform complex requirements into intuitive and beautiful user interfaces.

list.title: Multi-Platform Mobile Apps
list.description: Using Flutter, I develop high-performance mobile applications for both Android and iOS from a single codebase. This approach saves time and ensures a consistent user experience across all devices.

list.title: Code Modernization & Optimization
list.description: I can refactor and modernize existing codebases to improve performance, reduce technical debt, and make them easier to maintain. I also partner with backend teams to optimize API responses for faster load times.

benefits.title: Why Work With Me?
benefits.subtitle: I deliver tangible results, not just code.

list.title: Scalable & High-Performance
list.description: Building robust applications capable of handling high traffic, like payment gateways with over 20,000 daily transactions.

list.title: Efficient & Modern Code
list.description: Leveraging reusable component libraries and modern architecture to cut down on maintenance time and ensure consistency.

list.title: User-Centric & Reliable
list.description: Collaborating closely with UI/UX teams to create intuitive interfaces and reliable systems trusted by leading banks.

job.title: Frontend Developer
achievements: Played a key role in a payment gateway processing over 20,000 transactions daily.
Developed 80% of the frontend for a user onboarding system used by 4 leading Venezuelan banks.
Engineered a comprehensive Angular library with over 50 reusable components.
Modernized code architecture, cutting monthly maintenance by 50 hours.

contact.title: Ready to build something amazing?
contact.description: Let's connect! I'm ready to help you achieve your goals. Reach out for a consultation or just to say hello.
